name: Outside A Cave In The Deep, Dark Forest
description:
You are at the end of a broad, irregular path.  To the north is a very
large ominous-looking cave opening.  The trees here have many marks as if
something with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage.

exits.description: The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.
The path winds its way westward.

extra_descriptions.description:
The ancient grey giants have many marks as if something with huge claws has
been tearing at them in rage.
The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.
